CustomField.formula: Case( GlobalCustomerValueInfo_Life__c, "Cero Estrellas", HYPERLINK($Setup.Customer_KPI_Help__c.CLTV_Life__c, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_000.gif", "Stars"),"_self"), "Una Estrella", HYPERLINK($Setup.Customer_KPI_Help__c.CLTV_Life__c, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_100.gif", "Stars"),"_self"), "Dos Estrellas", HYPERLINK($Setup.Customer_KPI_Help__c.CLTV_Life__c, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_200.gif", "Stars"),"_self"), "Tres Estrellas", HYPERLINK($Setup.Customer_KPI_Help__c.CLTV_Life__c, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_300.gif", "Stars"),"_self"), "Cuatro Estrellas", HYPERLINK($Setup.Customer_KPI_Help__c.CLTV_Life__c, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_400.gif", "Stars"),"_self"), "Cinco Estrellas", HYPERLINK($Setup.Customer_KPI_Help__c.CLTV_Life__c, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_500.gif", "Stars"),"_self"), "No Value" )
CustomField.label: Global Customer Value (Life)
